code: import{FETCH_COMMENTS_START,FETCH_COMMENTS_SUCCESS,FETCH_COMMENTS_FAILURE,SAVE_COMMENT_START,SAVE_COMMENT_SUCCESS,SAVE_COMMENT_FAILURE,DELETE_COMMENT_START,DELETE_COMMENT_SUCCESS,DELETE_COMMENT_FAILURE,FETCH_COMMENT_REPLIES_START,FETCH_COMMENT_REPLIES_SUCCESS,FETCH_COMMENT_REPLIES_FAILURE,SAVE_COMMENT_REPLY_START,SAVE_COMMENT_REPLY_SUCCESS,SAVE_COMMENT_REPLY_FAILURE}from"./ActionConstant";export function fetchCommentsStart(data){return{type:FETCH_COMMENTS_START,data:data};}export function fetchCommentsSuccess(data){return{type:FETCH_COMMENTS_SUCCESS,data:data};}export function fetchCommentsFailure(error){return{type:FETCH_COMMENTS_FAILURE,error:error};}export function saveCommentStart(data){return{type:SAVE_COMMENT_START,data:data};}export function saveCommentSuccess(data){return{type:SAVE_COMMENT_SUCCESS,data:data};}export function saveCommentFailure(error){return{type:SAVE_COMMENT_FAILURE,error:error};}export function deleteCommentStart(data){return{type:DELETE_COMMENT_START,data:data};}export function deleteCommentSuccess(data){return{type:DELETE_COMMENT_SUCCESS,data:data};}export function deleteCommentFailure(error){return{type:DELETE_COMMENT_FAILURE,error:error};}export function fetchCommentRepliesStart(data){return{type:FETCH_COMMENT_REPLIES_START,data:data};}export function fetchCommentRepliesSuccess(data){return{type:FETCH_COMMENT_REPLIES_SUCCESS,data:data};}export function fetchCommentRepliesFailure(error){return{type:FETCH_COMMENT_REPLIES_FAILURE,error:error};}export function saveCommentReplyStart(data){return{type:SAVE_COMMENT_REPLY_START,data:data};}export function saveCommentReplySuccess(data){return{type:SAVE_COMMENT_REPLY_SUCCESS,data:data};}export function saveCommentReplyFailure(error){return{type:SAVE_COMMENT_REPLY_FAILURE,error:error};}
